materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a valley in Cisarua in Java, Indonesia. Mount Pangrango and Mount Gede can be seen in the faint background in the distance. In the center of the photograph, there are a few roofed houses, with a sheltered bridge in the center. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Cisarua valley with Pangrango and Mount Gede in the distance, Java
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Valleys Mountains Cisarua (Bogor, Indonesia)
